thread.title: Emulate Anwar and work with Dr M, reformasi veterans told
thread.title_full: Emulate Anwar and work with Dr M, reformasi veterans told

title: Emulate Anwar and work with Dr M, reformasi veterans told
text:
More 
Veterans of the reformasi movement should emulate their leader Anwar Ibrahim and work with Dr Mahathir Mohamad to defeat Prime Minister Najib Abdul Razak, said PKR Youth chief Nik Nazmi Nik Ahmad. 
"I'm confident it is not easy for them (reformists) to accept (Mahathir) just like that. We understand their sentiments...
